import FooterScreen from "./FooterScreen"; import HeaderScreen from "./HeaderScreen"; import { Form, Button, Container, Col, Row, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function Contactscreen() { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [emailError, setEmailError] = useState(""); const [nameError, setNameError] = useState(""); const [phoneError, setPhoneError] = useState(""); const [verified,setVerified]=useState(false) return ( <>

Contact Details

Enter your details so that we can contact you!

{/* Not in use */} Enter your name * setName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your full name" required /> {nameError} Enter email address{" "} * setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter your email address" required /> {emailError} Enter Mobile no.* mobileValidation(e.target.value)} placeholder="9179******" name="" /> {phoneError} Message:- setMessage(e.target.value)} placeholder="type here..." />


); } export default Contactscreen;
